name: Seed Migration
description:
An ode to the old flash-style upgrade launch games, Seed Migration takes you on a journey as an acorn making it's way as far as it can to grow a tree somewhere new!

Controls:

Mouse to navigate through the menus.

Rotate your seed with A and D or the arrow keys.

Upgrades will tell you how to use them as you unlock them, read the tooltips!

Credits:

Game created by team Yoinky Sploinky!

Tetra "kenoTetra" Chaney (Design/Programming)

Aiden Cvengros (Programming/Design)

Allison Nesbitt (Sound)

Naja D'égoutter (Music)

Sky Wurtz (Art)

Notes:

Windows only at the moment! WebGL coming soon <3
